name: Bundesverband der Agrargewerblichen Wirtschaft e.V.
goal: The BVA has the purpose of representing the interests of the agribusiness sector, especially in ministries, other government agencies and other organizations of the economy and society.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Regulation 1107/2009
- endocrine disruptors
- minor uses
- fertilizer regulations
- regulation on official controls
